summary: The Depot Investment Reform Act (S. 1539) aims to amend Title 10 of the United States Code, specifically Section 2476(a)(1), regarding minimum capital investments for Department of Defense depots. The bill modifies the calculation for these investments, considering the preceding fiscal year, the current fiscal year, and the estimated amount for the following fiscal year. It was introduced in the Senate on April 30, 2025, by Senators Fetterman and Cotton and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
